'''''City of Winds and Idylls''''' is an original soundtrack CD set. It was released on August 4, 2021.

This CD set contains the OST album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]'' of three discs "City of Winds and Idylls," "The Horizon of Dandelion," and "Saga of the West Wind."

A bonus CD ''[[The Wind and The Star Traveler (CD)|The Wind and The Star Traveler]]'' is attached to this CD Set.
